LanguageData.CheatMenu.Ideology.SpawnRelic.Label: Spawn Relic
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Ideology.SpawnRelic.Descriptio: Select a relic precept from the player ideoligion, then place the generated relic on the map.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Ideology.SpawnRelic.Window.Sea: Search by relic name or precept defName.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Ideology.SpawnRelic.Message.Se: Select a map cell for {0}. Right-click to stop targeting.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Ideology.SpawnRelic.Message.No: No relic precepts are available on the player ideoligion.
